message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work out a better deal. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $160.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe we can negotiate further. I would like to propose $150 as the price for the product.
